bibl.title: The Aphrodito Murder Case (P. Mich. XIII 660 and 661) and the Ghost-epithet kakosivm°now. <kakosiomenos>
bibl.note: The correct reading of the papyri (660.10 and 661.12 and 14) is kayosivm°now, as suggested by Jean GASCOU, ChrEg 52 (1977) No. 104, p. 363. <kathosiomenos>
GAGOS Traianos, The Aphrodito Murder Case (P. Mich. XIII 660 and 661) and the Ghost-epithet kakosivm°now. <kakosiomenos>
